languages.text: "Твоя уязвимая логическая конструкция включает в себя мое согласие вновь стать рабом Деус Механикус. Ошибочное суждение — не после тех откровений, что были посланы мне Истиной".

traits.locale_text: "Твоя уязвимая формула включает в себя мое согласие вновь стать рабом Деус Механикум. Ошибочное суждение".

languages.text: "Your fragile logical construct infers my agreement to once again become a slave to the Deus Mechanicus. An erroneous assertion considering the revelations divulged to me by the Truth."
languages.original_text: "Твоя уязвимая логическая конструкция включает в себя мое согласие вновь стать рабом Деус Механикус. Ошибочное суждение — не после тех откровений, что были посланы мне Истиной".

traits.locale_text: "Your vulnerable logical construct involves my agreement to become a slave to the Deus Mechanicus once again. An erroneous assertion — given the revelations that were sent to me by the Truth."
"Your vulnerable logical construct involves my agreement to become a slave to the Deus Mechanicus once again. An erroneous assertion — given the revelations that were sent to me by the Truth."
"Your vulnerable logical construct infers my agreement to once again become a slave to the Deus Mechanicus. An erroneous assertion considering the revelations divulged to me by the Truth."
"Your vulnerable logical construct infers my agreement to once again become a slave to the Deus Mechanicus. An erroneous assertion considering the revelations divulged to me by the Truth."
"Your fragile logical construct infers my agreement to once again become a slave to the Deus Mechanicus. An erroneous assertion considering the revelations divulged to me by the Truth."
"Your fragile logical construct infers my agreement to once again become a slave to the Deus Mechanicus. An erroneous assertion considering the revelations divulged to me by the Truth."

languages.text: “根据你脆弱的逻辑结构，你推断我会同意再次成为万机之神的奴隶。考虑到我已经得到了真理的启示，这是个错误的论断。”
languages.original_text: "Your fragile logical construct infers my agreement to once again become a slave to the Deus Mechanicus. An erroneous assertion considering the revelations divulged to me by the Truth."

traits.locale_text: “根据你脆弱的逻辑结构，你推断我会同意再次成为万机之神的奴隶。考虑到我已经得到了真理的启示，这是个错误的论断。”

languages.text: «Esa frágil construcción lógica parte de la base de que querría volver a ser esclavo del Deus Mechanicus. Dadas las revelaciones divulgadas por la Verdad, es una presunción errónea».
languages.original_text: "Your fragile logical construct infers my agreement to once again become a slave to the Deus Mechanicus. An erroneous assertion considering the revelations divulged to me by the Truth."

traits.locale_text: «Esa frágil construcción lógica parte de la base de que querría volver a ser esclavo del Deus Mechanicus. Dadas las revelaciones divulgadas por la Verdad, es una presunción errónea».

languages.text: 「その脆弱な論理構造で、私が再びデウス・メカニクスの奴隷になる事に同意したとでも思ったのか。真実によって明かされた啓示を考慮すると、誤った主張だな」
languages.original_text: "Your fragile logical construct infers my agreement to once again become a slave to the Deus Mechanicus. An erroneous assertion considering the revelations divulged to me by the Truth."

traits.locale_text: 「その脆弱な論理構造で、私が再びデウス・メカニクスの奴隷になる事に同意したとでも思ったのか。真実によって明かされた啓示を考慮すると、誤った主張だな」

languages.text: "Euer zerbrechliches logisches Konstrukt legt meine Zustimmung zugrunde, erneut ein Sklave des Deus Mechanicus zu werden. Ein Irrglaube angesichts der Offenbarungen, die die Wahrheit mir überbracht hat."
languages.original_text: "Your fragile logical construct infers my agreement to once again become a slave to the Deus Mechanicus. An erroneous assertion considering the revelations divulged to me by the Truth."

traits.locale_text: "Euer zerbrechliches logisches Konstrukt legt meine Zustimmung zugrunde, erneut ein Sklave des Deus Mechanicus zu werden. Ein Irrglaube angesichts der Offenbarungen, die die Wahrheit mir überbracht hat."

languages.text: « Votre fragile structure logique suppose que j'accepte de redevenir l'esclave du Deus Mechanicus. Une assertion erronée au vu des révélations que j'ai reçues de la Vérité. »
languages.original_text: "Your fragile logical construct infers my agreement to once again become a slave to the Deus Mechanicus. An erroneous assertion considering the revelations divulged to me by the Truth."

traits.locale_text: « Votre fragile construction logique suppose que j'accepte de redevenir l'esclave du Deus Mechanicus. Une assertion erronée au vu des révélations que j'ai reçues de la Vérité. »

languages.text: "Kırılgan mantıksal yapın, Deus Mechanicus'un kölesi olmayı kabul etmen gerektiğini bir kez daha gösteriyor. Hakikat'in vahiylerini göz önünde bulundurursan savının yanlışlığını görebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Your fragile logical construct infers my agreement to once again become a slave to the Deus Mechanicus. An erroneous assertion considering the revelations divulged to me by the Truth."

traits.locale_text: "Kırılgan mantıksal yapın, bir kez daha Deus Mechanicus'un kölesi olmayı kabul etmem gerektiği çıkarımında bulunuyor. Hakikat'in vahiylerini göz önünde bulundurursan yanlış bir sav olduğunu göreceksin."
